data.title: Litur
data.description: A color picker app for the real world. Find, collect and organize all the colors around you. A designer's delight! As a designer or creative, we often come across colours that we want to use in our later projects but as at the time, have no way of remembering them but just trusting our brains to know what we saw. Litur saves you that headache.
data.content:
Litur - find and collect the colors around you.
=============== 

![Image 1](https://litur.app/assets/litur_new.png) Litur

Updates2

  [Press Kit](https://litur.app/presskit)   [Support](mailto:knightbenax+litur@gmail.com)

![Image 2](https://litur.app/assets/litur_new.png)

A color picker for the real world.

Find, collect and organize all the colors around you.  
A designer’s best-kept secret, a developer's best friend.  
  
Available on iOS/iPadOS, watchOS & macOS

![Image 3](https://litur.app/assets/mac.png) Mac [Try for Free](https://vendors.paddle.com/download/product/3480b682-5da5-44bf-9c74-655183e23dbb) Buy Now - $11.99 [![Image 4](https://litur.app/assets/macappstore.svg)](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id1519450882)

![Image 5](https://litur.app/assets/iphone.png) iPhone & Watch

[![Image 6](https://litur.app/assets/appstore.svg)](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/litur/id1487096693?ls=1)

![Image 7](https://litur.app/assets/ipad.png) iPad

[![Image 8](https://litur.app/assets/appstore.svg)](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/litur/id1487096693?ls=1)

[![Image 9: Litur for macOS - A better way to find, collect & organize your colors | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/top-post-badge.svg?post_id=212967&theme=light&period=daily&t=1738705138796)](https://www.producthunt.com/posts/litur-for-macos?embed=true&utm_source=badge-top-post-badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-litur-for-macos) [![Image 10: Litur - Find and collect the colors around you. | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/top-post-topic-badge.svg?post_id=847887&theme=light&period=weekly&topic_id=44&t=1739228803635)](https://www.producthunt.com/posts/litur-2?embed=true&utm_source=badge-top-post-topic-badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-litur-2)

![Image 11](https://litur.app/assets/imgs/screens/group.png)

All new designMacLitur sports an all-new design on macOS. How it looks, how it works, and how it feels.  
Tabs or Windows, choose the best way to work with your colors and palettes, manage your workflow in the best way for you.

![Image 12](https://litur.app/assets/imgs/screens/design.png)

![Image 13](https://litur.app/assets/imgs/screens/new_history.png)

HistorySee every color you have collected and saved, synced across all your devices.

Color AnchorMacLitur gives you a new docked window that allows you fast access to your color library or palettes. To help speed up your design or development workflow

 ![Image 14](https://litur.app/assets/imgs/screens/dock.png)

![Image 15](https://litur.app/assets/imgs/screens/new_combinations.png)

Color PaletteLitur also generates a color palette for all colors you collect.

Color CombinationsSee different color combinations for each color you collect: Complimentary, Analogous, Monochromatic, Triadic and Tetradic

Color CodesLitur allows you get the color codes in hex, rgb, hsb, NSColor, UIColor and SwiftUI Color for use in your projects.

![Image 16](https://litur.app/assets/imgs/screens/new_codes.png)

Contrast CheckeriPhoneLitur allows you enter color combinations to check whether they conform to Web Content Accessibility Guidelines

![Image 17](https://litur.app/assets/imgs/screens/contrast.png)

![Image 18](https://litur.app/assets/imgs/screens/palette.png) Custom Color PalettesYou can create palettes from the colors you collect and assign a name to each palette.

Find, collect and organize all the colors around you.  
  
Get Litur

![Image 19](https://litur.app/assets/mac.png) Mac [Try for Free](https://vendors.paddle.com/download/product/3480b682-5da5-44bf-9c74-655183e23dbb) Buy Now - $11.99 [![Image 20](https://litur.app/assets/macappstore.svg)](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id1519450882)

![Image 21](https://litur.app/assets/iphone.png) iPhone & Watch

[![Image 22](https://litur.app/assets/appstore.svg)](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/litur/id1487096693?ls=1)

![Image 23](https://litur.app/assets/ipad.png) iPad

[![Image 24](https://litur.app/assets/appstore.svg)](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/litur/id1487096693?ls=1)

[![Image 25: Litur for macOS - A better way to find, collect & organize your colors | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/top-post-badge.svg?post_id=212967&theme=light&period=daily&t=1738705138796)](https://www.producthunt.com/posts/litur-for-macos?embed=true&utm_source=badge-top-post-badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-litur-for-macos) [![Image 26: Litur - Find and collect the colors around you. | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/top-post-topic-badge.svg?post_id=847887&theme=light&period=weekly&topic_id=44&t=1739228803635)](https://www.producthunt.com/posts/litur-2?embed=true&utm_source=badge-top-post-topic-badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-litur-2)
